ygData.subject: Having troubles...
ygData.msgSnippet: I am a bit lost as to where I should be hunting right now. I have reached level 15, I am almost 16.  I have maxed both dual wield and double attack at 80 each.
ygData.messageBody:
I am a bit lost as to where I should be hunting right now.

I have reached level 15, I am almost 16. I have maxed both dual wield and double attack at 80 each. I seem to be having trouble effectively hunting. Anything that cons white to me is always a tough fight that can go either way, so I usually end up sticking to blue critters. However some blue critters are just to tough to solo. Lava basilisks are a no-no because of Stone Breath, fire elementals have some kind of damage shield which causes me damage each time I hit so they are a no-no also. Lavastorm being my preferred hunting area right now. I tried crocs in Oasis, but it is to crowded when I play (8pm-10pm) for me to even find anything to kill.

I guess I am at that awkward level and was looking for advice from other warriors on how they got fro 15 to 16.

Bael
Warrior of the 15th Order
Indigo Brotherhood of the Tier'dal
